questions.fact: Gujarat's coastline stretches 1,600 km - longer than India's nuclear-capable Agni-V missile range (1,500 km)!

questions.question: The Indian Railways' 'Vande Bharat Express' can reach what maximum speed?
questions.fact: Its acceleration is 0-100 kmph in just 52 seconds - faster than most luxury cars!

questions.question: Which Indian city hosts the world's highest cricket ground?
questions.fact: At 2,444 meters elevation, it's 244 meters higher than Bolivia's famous 'Death Road'!

questions.question: India's ASHA healthcare workers cover what distance daily on average?
questions.fact: Collectively, they walk equivalent to circling Earth 17,000 times annually!

questions.question: The Indian Tricolor's chakra has how many spokes?
questions.fact: Each spoke represents 1 hour of the day - symbolizing constant progress!

questions.question: How many times does the human heart beat in an average lifetime?
questions.fact: Enough energy to lift an elephant 3 km high if harnessed!

questions.question: Your small intestine's length is approximately?
questions.fact: If unfolded, its surface area would cover a badminton court!

questions.question: Which body part grows 0.3-0.5 mm per minute?
questions.fact: Your scalp grows about 12 km of hair in a decade!

questions.question: How many taste buds does the average human tongue have?
questions.fact: They regenerate every 10-14 days - faster than any other body cell!

questions.question: The human eye can distinguish about how many colors?
questions.fact: More color variations than all pixels on an 8K TV combined!

questions.question: India's first rocket was transported by?
questions.fact: The 1963 launch vehicle parts were carried to Thumba on cycle and bullock carts!

questions.question: Which Indian state produces 95% of India's saffron?
questions.fact: 1 kg saffron requires 150,000 flowers - worth ₹2-3 lakhs!

questions.question: The world's highest battlefield is in?
questions.fact: At 5,400m, soldiers consume 8,000 calories/day (3x normal) just to survive!

questions.question: Your bones are stronger than which material?
questions.fact: A matchbox-sized bone can support 9,000 kg - equal to 5 cars!

questions.question: How fast does a sneeze travel?
questions.fact: Faster than India's fastest train (Gatimaan Express at 160 kmph)!

questions.question: Your brain generates enough electricity to?
questions.fact: About 12-25 watts - enough for 2 energy-saving bulbs!

questions.question: Which country has the most pyramids in the world?
questions.fact: Sudan has over 200 pyramids - double Egypt's count!

questions.question: What percentage of Earth's surface is covered by water?
questions.fact: Oceans hold 96.5% of all Earth's water!

questions.question: Which planet rains diamonds?
questions.fact: Atmospheric pressure turns methane into diamonds!

questions.question: What is the only continent without bees?
questions.fact: Too cold for pollinators!

questions.question: Which country has no rivers?
questions.fact: World's largest country without a permanent river!

questions.question: How many minutes does sunlight take to reach Earth?
questions.fact: Traveling at light speed (299,792 km/s)!

questions.question: Which fruit has its seeds on the outside?
questions.fact: Each strawberry has ~200 seeds!

questions.question: What percentage of human DNA is identical to bananas?
questions.fact: We share 98.7% DNA with chimpanzees!

questions.question: Which country has the most time zones?
questions.fact: 12 time zones due to overseas territories!

questions.question: Where is the world's quietest room located?
questions.fact: -20.6 dB - you can hear your blood flow!

questions.question: Which animal never sleeps?
questions.fact: They can stay awake for years!

questions.question: What is the only food that never spoils?
questions.fact: Edible after 3000 years - found in Egyptian tombs!

questions.question: Which country has the most languages?
questions.fact: 840 languages in 462,840 sq km!

questions.question: What is the hottest planet in our solar system?
questions.fact: Avg temp 465°C - hot enough to melt lead!

questions.question: Which country invented tea bags by accident?
questions.fact: 1908: Thomas Sullivan sent tea in silk bags, customers brewed them directly!

questions.question: How many Earths can fit inside the Sun?
questions.fact: Sun's volume is 1.3 million times Earth's!

questions.question: Which country has the most islands?
questions.fact: 267,570 islands - only 1,000 inhabited!

questions.question: What is the only mammal capable of true flight?
questions.fact: Over 1,400 bat species exist!

questions.question: Which country has a town called 'Hell' that freezes every winter?
questions.fact: Temperatures drop to -30°C!

questions.question: What is the most stolen food in the world?
questions.fact: 4% of global cheese production is stolen!

questions.question: Which planet has the shortest day?
questions.fact: 9 hours 55 minutes per rotation!

questions.question: Where is the world's largest desert located?
questions.fact: 14 million sq km - receives <50mm rain/year!

questions.question: Which country has the most vending machines per capita?
questions.fact: 1 vending machine per 23 people!

questions.question: What is the only letter not appearing in any US state name?
questions.fact: Z appears in Arizona; X in Texas, New Mexico!

questions.question: Which country has a national 'Useless Inventions Museum'?
questions.fact: Features inventions like noodle-cooling fans!

questions.question: Which Indian state grows 95% of India's saffron?
questions.fact: 1 kg requires 150,000 flowers - worth ₹2-3 lakhs!

questions.question: India's first rocket was transported by?
questions.fact: 1963: Parts carried to Thumba on cycles & bullock carts!

questions.question: Which Indian city has the world's highest cricket ground?
questions.fact: 2,444m elevation - higher than Bolivia's 'Death Road'!

questions.question: The Indian Tricolor's chakra has how many spokes?
questions.fact: Each represents 1 hour - symbolizing constant progress!

questions.question: Which Indian state has the longest coastline?
questions.fact: 1,600 km - longer than India's Agni-V missile range!

questions.question: India's ASHA healthcare workers walk how much daily on average?
questions.fact: Collectively circle Earth 17,000 times annually!

questions.question: Which Indian monument changes color from pink to golden?
questions.fact: Pink at dawn, white by day, golden at sunset!

questions.question: India's Vande Bharat Express reaches what max speed?
questions.fact: 0-100 kmph in 52 sec - faster than luxury cars!

questions.question: Which Indian state produces 90% of world's sandalwood?
questions.fact: 1 kg pure sandalwood oil costs ₹1.5 lakh!

questions.question: Where is Asia's only active volcano located in India?
questions.fact: Last erupted in 2022!

questions.question: Which Indian city has the world's largest sundial?
questions.fact: Jantar Mantar's samrat yantra is 27m tall!

questions.question: India's first talking robot 'Rashmi' speaks how many languages?
questions.fact: Including Hindi, English, Bhojpuri!

questions.question: Which Indian state has the highest literacy rate?
questions.fact: 94% literacy - higher than global average!

questions.question: India's first post office was established in?
questions.fact: Before USA became independent!

questions.question: Which Indian city has the world's largest office building?
questions.fact: Surat Diamond Bourse: 7.1 million sq ft!

questions.question: India's first fingerprint bureau was established in?
questions.fact: By the British Raj!

questions.question: Which Indian state has the highest number of tigers?
questions.fact: 785 tigers as per 2022 census!

questions.question: India's first digital village is located in?
questions.fact: Fully cashless since 2015!

questions.question: Which Indian city has the highest number of bridges?
questions.fact: Over 50 bridges including sea links!

questions.question: India's first 3D-printed post office is in?
questions.fact: Built in just 43 days!

questions.question: Which Indian state has the highest number of airports?
questions.fact: 15 operational airports!

questions.question: India's first underwater metro is in which city?
questions.fact: 16m under Hooghly river!

questions.question: Which Indian state has the highest number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites?
questions.fact: 6 sites including Ajanta-Ellora!

questions.question: India's first solar-powered village is in which state?
questions.fact: 24x7 solar power since 2022!
